attributes.action: Introduce an oyster card for people throughout the UK not just London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to introduce a card similar to the oyster card for people throughout the United Kingdom to use for public transport, so it can remove the use of train and bus tickets and offer people discounts. This would ensure that people will not purchase the wrong tickets such as; an adult buying a child ticket. Categories such as Child Cards, Student Cards, Adult Cards, OAP Cards and those who work in the Public Sector should be introduced.
